extendedInfo.description: Stay informed with the first and only app covering Northern New Jerseyâs latest news.Powered by The Record and over 40 community newspapers, NorthJersey.com Latest News brings you:â¢ Breaking national and international newsâ¢ Up-to-the-minute local, county and state coverageâ¢ Award-winning pro sportsâ¢ High school sports, including scoresâ¢ Crime & courts, business, A&E, celebrities and moreYour world.  One app. Customize NorthJersey.com Latest News to get the local coverage you care about most front and center. Simply select your town to display your townâs news. With one touch, go back to all the breaking news.  Stay on top of the news that matters to you, in your neighborhood and around the world.If you live or work in North Jersey, this is the app for you. Download NorthJersey.com Latest News today.

reviews.title: Nice news app but missing option
reviews.comment: This a a great news app for those in northern NJ.  Local, state, sports, etc, its all there.  I only give 3 stars because the sharing options are limited and text size is small.  These need to be addressed in the next version.
reviews.author: Joseph Goss

reviews.title: No landscape mode.
reviews.comment: It won\'t go into landscape mode still after all these many months and now for the past week or so it no longer even will pull down the news despite clicking the refresh button. I think the developers have abandoned this app.
reviews.author: Alvester Garnett

reviews.comment: This used to be a good app. Now it sucks. Will not load any news stories at all. The developers need to fix it or scrap the app completely.
reviews.author: Ken Collucci

reviews.title: Sometimes it works..
reviews.comment: But outages and crashes happen often.  The editing appears haphazard.  It fails to make use of the internet, rarely using art or maps.  But folks, if you want to ding the app, do it for the right reasons, not because you did not read the description that it is the record, which mostly covers bergen and Passaic counties.  The ledger has its own app. Update 8/29 Still no data, sent feedback 2 days ago, did not even get an auto reply, uninstall and reinstall, still no data.
reviews.author: Gene McTiernan

reviews.comment: Smart design makes it easy to share stories and find news by town.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not load news stories
reviews.comment: When it wants to work it is a good app.  For the last week all it does is load the app it will not show any news stories.
reviews.author: Matt Rodriguez

reviews.title: Very cool. North Jersey town news at my fingertips
reviews.comment: when I want it...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing my town
reviews.comment: Nice app but missing too many major town like Bernardsville, Maple Shade,  Morristown and many others.
reviews.author: Jerry T

reviews.title: Inconsistent
reviews.comment: 3 days and can\'t get anything but an empty screen...  Uninstalled several times. This is not the first time this has occurred.  Don\'t bother installing until they fix it.
reviews.author: Mark Horst

reviews.comment: Definately like it. Can get all news or just what I want to....everything about my town. Nice
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing my town!!!!
reviews.comment: I was so excited when I saw this app. Finally an app specific to my town in Jersey.  I download it only to find it is missing. NO MAPLEWOOD, SOUTH ORANGE, NEWARK, EAST & WEST ORANGE. I can\'t uninstall fast enough. Correct the app and i might get it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this for breaking news. Fast and free. Great local coverage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sometimes Great.. sometimes Not
reviews.comment: The news is great and regularly updated.  Only issue I have come across is it fails to load sometimes.
reviews.author: Kevin Palmeri

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why does app need read contact data permission?
reviews.comment: Why does this app need read contact data permission? Hey app developers: Stop with the aggressive permissions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: I have un-installed it reinstalled it still doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome. World news county news sports and town. Bravo as they say at the opera
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it. I can see international news and town hyperlocal in a push of a button
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love that I can customize this to get the latest from my town.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid Razr
reviews.comment: Everytime I open app, there is no content just blank with header title.
reviews.author: P Han
